title: No, That Democrat Didn’t Vote ‘100% of the Time’ With Nancy Pelosi
description: G.O.P. operatives, like a classic rock station playing “Stairway to Heaven,” believe that the hits work, and so they eagerly link vulnerable Democrats to the “radical San Francisco liberal.”
media:credit: Gabriela Bhaskar for The New York Times
media:description: Speaker Nancy Pelosi last month. By House tradition, the speaker usually does not vote.
